38  |  Technology and InnovationWomen in IT 
Every year, the University of Arkansas’ Walton College Executive 
Education and the Department of Information Systems hosts 
a one-day Women in IT Hack the Journey conference. At this 
event, women with careers in information technology can 
network and attend sessions that discuss what’s new and 
next in the industry. In 2021, ArcBest sponsored the event and 
registered more than 20 ArcBest Technologies employees 
to attend virtually. Session topics included business ethics, 
financial technology, Internet of Things, narrative building, 
blockchain and product management.
